Matthew Spiegelman

Miami Beach, Florida

Lives and works in New York

+1 (323) 610-0797 info@matthewspiegelman.com

EDUCATION

  • Bard College, Annandale-on-Hudson, NY
  • Bachelor of Arts, May 1997
  • Concentrations in Photography and Art History

TEACHING, LECTURES

  • Associate Professor of Photography, Parsons The New School for Design, New York, 2011-2018
  • Distinguished University Teaching Award Nominee: 2015, 2016
  • Curriculum Redesign Task Force, Parsons The New School for Design, 2013-2015
  • Visiting Artist, Pratt Institute, 2013-2014
  • Guest Critic, Sarah Lawrence College, New York, Spring 2011
  • Guest Critic, Pratt Institute, 2010
  • Visiting Critic, Parsons The New School for Design, 2010
